DLCL 122 - 2017 - MS Repositories

Some Digital Manuscript Repositories

  • Gallica (Bibliothèque national de France)
  • British Library
  • Digital Bodleian
  • Cambridge Digital Library
  • Wren Digital Library
  • e-codices
  • Heidelberg - Bibliotheca Palatina digital
  • Digital Vatican Library
  • BVMM (French city libraries)
  • Manuscripta Medievalia
  • Manuscriptorium

For more, see Siân Echard’s site Medieval Manuscripts on the Web
